
10110111 00001111 00000000 10000000 // Addr: 000 00000000 10000000000000000000111110110111 lui x31, 0x80000
10011011 10001111 11101111 11111111 // Addr: 004 00000100 11111111111011111000111110011011 addiw x31, x31, -0x2
10010011 11101111 11111111 01111111 // Addr: 008 00001000 01111111111111111110111110010011 ori x31, x31, 0x7ff
